headline.main: Allman Film Director Jailed in Georgia Seeks Early Release
headline.print_headline: Allman Film Director Jailed in Georgia Seeks Early Release

docs.snippet: A movie director sentenced to jail for the on-set death of a camera assistant asked a Georgia judge to set him free less than a year after he began serving time for the fatal train collision during shooting of a film about singer Gregg Allman....
docs.lead_paragraph: A movie director sentenced to jail for the on-set death of a camera assistant asked a Georgia judge to set him free less than a year after he began serving time for the fatal train collision during shooting of a film about singer Gregg Allman.

headline.main: 'Wayne Train': Clemson RB Gallman Provides QB Major Assist
headline.print_headline: 'Wayne Train': Clemson RB Gallman Provides QB Major Assist

docs.snippet: Quarterback Deshaun Watson is certainly the face of No. 1 Clemson's high-powered offense. Then there's the broad, strong shoulders of running back Wayne Gallman, who powers the Tigers' ground attack on long drives....
docs.lead_paragraph: Quarterback Deshaun Watson is certainly the face of No. 1 Clemson's high-powered offense. Then there's the broad, strong shoulders of running back Wayne Gallman, who powers the Tigers' ground attack on long drives.

headline.main: US Bureau of Economic Analysis Mistakenly Issues Data Early
headline.print_headline: US Bureau of Economic Analysis Mistakenly Issues Data Early

docs.snippet: The government on Tuesday mistakenly released data on consumer spending for November the day before its scheduled release....
docs.lead_paragraph: The government on Tuesday mistakenly released data on consumer spending for November the day before its scheduled release.

headline.main: Missouri Meth Couple Charged in Child's Death in Overheated Room
headline.print_headline: Missouri Meth Couple Charged in Child's Death in Overheated Room

docs.snippet: A Missouri couple that made and used methamphetamine in their home has been charged in the death of a 2-year-old boy abandoned in an overheated room, according to court documents....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Missouri couple that made and used methamphetamine in their home has been charged in the death of a 2-year-old boy abandoned in an overheated room, according to court documents.

headline.main: U.N. Security Council Alarmed by Yemen Ceasefire Violations
headline.print_headline: U.N. Security Council Alarmed by Yemen Ceasefire Violations

docs.snippet: The United Nations Security Council on Wednesday voiced alarm at breaches of a ceasefire in Yemen that was introduced alongside U.N.-brokered peace talks aimed at ending a civil war between the exiled government and Iranian-allied Houthi rebels....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations Security Council on Wednesday voiced alarm at breaches of a ceasefire in Yemen that was introduced alongside U.N.-brokered peace talks aimed at ending a civil war between the exiled government and Iranian-allied Houthi rebels.

headline.main: Rand Paul Spreads Holiday Gloom With Assist From ‘Seinfeld’

docs.snippet: In honor of “Festivus,” a creation of the “Seinfeld” TV sitcom, Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky partook of that holiday’s traditional “airing of grievances,” aiming them at other presidential candidates....
docs.abstract: In honor of “Festivus,” a creation of the “Seinfeld” TV sitcom, Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky partook of that holiday’s traditional “airing of grievances,” aiming them at other presidential candidates.

headline.main: Slovenia Nominates Its Ex-President Turk as Candidate for U.N. Secretary
headline.print_headline: Slovenia Nominates Its Ex-President Turk as Candidate for U.N. Secretary

docs.snippet: The Slovenian government on Wednesday nominated former president Danilo Turk as a candidate for United Nations secretary-general....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Slovenian government on Wednesday nominated former president Danilo Turk as a candidate for United Nations secretary-general.

headline.main: Hvorostovsky Withdraws From February Performances at Met
headline.print_headline: Hvorostovsky Withdraws From February Performances at Met

docs.snippet: Dmitri Hvorostovsky has withdrawn from four February performances of Verdi's "Il Trovatore" at the Metropolitan Opera because of ongoing treatment for a brain tumor....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dmitri Hvorostovsky has withdrawn from four February performances of Verdi's "Il Trovatore" at the Metropolitan Opera because of ongoing treatment for a brain tumor.

headline.main: Miami's Miracle, Butler's Pick Lead Plays of the Year
headline.print_headline: Miami's Miracle, Butler's Pick Lead Plays of the Year

docs.snippet: Sometimes, games, seasons and championships were at stake. Sometimes, ordinary moments turned extraordinary in an instant. They were the kind of moments that made fans leap from their seats in disbelief and grab their phones to share the excitemen...
docs.lead_paragraph: Sometimes, games, seasons and championships were at stake. Sometimes, ordinary moments turned extraordinary in an instant. They were the kind of moments that made fans leap from their seats in disbelief and grab their phones to share the excitement.
